docblock.description: Helper for a formatted timestamp using date() format codes.
Outputs a formatted timestamp using date() format codes.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Any date-time string suitable for strtotime().

tag.name: param
tag.description: An optional custom date() formatting string.

docblock.description: The <title> value.

Appends to the end of the current <title> string.

docblock.description: Prepends to the beginning of the current <title> string.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The string to be appended to the title.

docblock.description: Returns the current title string (escaped).
Returns the current title string **unescaped**.
Helper for a stack of <meta ... /> tags.

Returns a <meta ... /> tag.

Returns a <meta name="" content="" /> tag.
Returns the stack of <meta ... /> tags as a single block.
Helper to escape attributes.
Converts an associative array to an escaped attribute string.

tag.name: param
tag.description: From this array, each key-value pair is converted to an attribute name and value.

docblock.description: Helper for a stack of <script> tags.

Adds a <script> tag to the stack.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The source href for the script.

docblock.description: Returns the stack of <script> tags as a single block.

The quote style to use when escaping.

Escapes values intended for output.

docblock.description: Helper to generate `<a ... />` tags.
Returns an anchor tag with the anchor text escaped.
Returns an anchor tag but does not escape the text; suitable for wrapping an anchor around other HTML, such as an image.
Provides a concrete Template View pattern implementation; it does not have access to the private support properties of the parent abstract.
Fetches the output from a template.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Variables to extract into the local scope.

docblock.description: Provides a Two Step View pattern implementation; this allows for an inner "view" and and outer "layout" as commonly used by web apps.
The name of the inner view template.
The data for the inner view template.
The paths to search when finding the inner view template.
The name of the outer layout template.
The data for the outer layout template.
The paths to search when finding the outer layout template.
The name of the variable in the outer layout template that should be replaced with the output of the inner view template.
The Template object to be used when rendering the inner view and outer layout.
Constructor.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The Template object to be used when rendering the inner view and outer layout.

docblock.description: Sets the name of the inner view template.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the inner view template.

docblock.description: Sets the data for the inner view template.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The data for the inner view template.

docblock.description: Sets the paths to search when finding the inner view template.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The paths to search when finding the inner view template.

docblock.description: Sets the name of the outer layout template.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name of the outer layout template.

docblock.description: Sets the data for the outer layout template.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The data for the outer layout template.

docblock.description: Sets the paths to search when finding the outer layout template.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The paths to search when finding the outer layout template.

docblock.description: Sets the name of the variable in the outer layout template that should be replaced with the output of the inner view template.
Renders the inner view and outer layout templates and returns the resulting output.
Finds files in user-defined path hierarchies.
The stack of paths.
A cache of found files, so we do not need to search the path stack for a particular file more than once.
Constructor.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The default path stack for this Finder.

docblock.description: Gets a copy of the current path stack.
Adds one path to the top of the path stack.
docblock.long-description: {{code: php $finder->prepend('/path/1'); $finder->prepend('/path/2'); $finder->prepend('/path/3'); // $finder->getPaths() reveals that the directory search order will be // '/path/3/', '/path/2/', '/path/1/'. }}

tag.name: param
tag.description: The directories to add to the paths.

docblock.description: Adds one path to the end of the path stack.
docblock.long-description: {{code: php $finder->append('/path/1'); $finder->append('/path/2'); $finder->append('/path/3'); // $finder->getPaths() reveals that the directory search order will be // '/path/1/', '/path/2/', '/path/3/'. }}

tag.name: param
tag.description: The directories to add to the paths.

docblock.description: Sets the paths directly.
docblock.long-description: {{code: php $finder->setPaths(array( '/path/1', '/path/2', '/path/3', )); // $finder->getPaths() reveals that the search order will be // '/path/1', '/path/2', '/path/3'. }}

tag.name: param
tag.description: The directories to add to the paths.

docblock.description: Finds a file in the paths.
docblock.long-description:
{{code: php $finder->append('/path/1'); $finder->append('/path/2'); $finder->append('/path/3');

$file = $finder->find('file.php');
// $file is now the first instance of 'file.php' found from the
// assigned paths, looking first for '/path/3/file.php', then for
// '/path/2/file.php', then finally for '/path/1/file.php'.

}}

tag.name: param
tag.description: The file to find using the assigned paths.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The absolute path to the file, or false if not found using the paths.

docblock.description: Checks to see if a file exists at a particular location.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The absolute path to the file, or false if not found.

docblock.description: Provides an abstract TemplateView pattern implementation. We use an abstract so that the extended "real" Template class does not have access to the private support properties herein.
View "finder" (to find views in a path stack).
Data assigned to the template.
A Container for helper objects, so that repeated calls to the same helper use the same object.
Constructor.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A container for helpers attached to this template.

docblock.description: Magic read access to template data.
Magic write access to template data.
Magic isset() checks on template data.
Magic unset() for template data.
Magic call to provide shared helpers as template methods.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The arguments to pass to the helper.

docblock.description: Sets the search paths for templates; paths are searched in FIFO order.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of directory paths where templates are.

docblock.description: Merges new data with the existing template data.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of key-value pairs where the keys are template variable names, and the values are the variable values.

docblock.description: Replaces all template data at once; this will remove all previous data.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of key-value pairs where the keys are template variable names, and the values are the variable values.

docblock.description: Gets all template variables.

tag.name: return
tag.description: An array of key-value pairs where the keys are template variable names, and the values are the variable values.

docblock.description: Returns the helper Container object.
Returns the path to the requested template script; searches through $this->paths to find the first matching template.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The template name to look for in the template path.

tag.name: return
tag.description: The full path to the template script.

docblock.description: Returns the Finder object.
Retrieves a shared helper from the helper container.
